name: Tower Empire Builder
description:
As the city continues to grow, lots are continuously being rezoned to make room for bigger and better infrastructure. Land is now becoming limited and instead of building sprawling campuses, new developments must reach skyward.

In Tower Empire Builder, you are the newest real estate company looking to establish a dominate presence. You will build a variety of condos, offices, retail space, and hotel rooms, and keep those tenants happy with state of the art amenities. In order to keep your tower running optimally, you will have to hire and manage your workforce while working out additional deals with the city government. Unlock the newest unit types by building your tower's population and maintaining a great reputation.

Keep in mind that the real estate game is a competitive business. Be ready for sabotage, accidents, and other curve balls thrown your way while trying to squash out any competitors that pop up.
